comments: Tests covering the use of the CONCAT function and the '+' operator

tests.name: concat fields using CONCAT
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (source VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT CONCAT('prefix-', CONCAT(source, '-postfix')) AS THING FROM TEST;

tests.name: concat fields using '+' operator
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (source VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT 'prefix-' + source + '-postfix' AS THING FROM TEST;
